tgt_original: 『是天子所散華，天上未曾見如是華。

src_original: yāni śakreṇa devānāmindreṇābhyavakīrṇāni,  manomayānyetāni puṣpāṇīti /  atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
tgt_original: 是諸天子所散華，從心樹生非樹生華。 』釋提桓因知須菩提心所念，語須菩提言：

src_original: na hi manonirjātāni kānicitpuṣpāṇi,  nāpi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātāni /
tgt_original: 是華非生華，亦非意樹生。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
